WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 15 FEB
   BY M/V SW DIAMOND TOWING
   TWO 225 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   25-06.25S 042-44.28W, 25-14.55S 042-41.27W,
   25-22.95S 042-43.33W, 25-28.80S 042-46.83W,
   25-22.08S 043-00.10W, 25-15.47S 043-02.43W,
   25-12.01S 043-09.17W, 25-04.90S 043-11.73W,
   25-00.13S 043-08.82W, 24-56.57S 042-59.08W,
   25-02.87S 042-46.62W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 16 FEB 22.
